resources.string: Welcome to The coin’s game. In this game, one player have to make a question to the second, the two will be elected with a spinner. The question will be known only by the two players. The second player have to say the answer to everybody. Then we will flip a coin. If heads you have to say the question to everyone. If tails, we finished the round.
Show dialogues about how to play
Okey, we are going to start the game. Here we have to choose two players through the spinner. The first player have to make the question and the second have to answer the question. Spin the spinner !
We have the two players… The first selected have to write the question to the second and click ‘send’. At the moment, the question can only being seen by who writes the question.
Pass the smartphone to the second player...
Now, read the question clicking on ‘SEE THE QUESTION’ and answer the question out loud. The question will keep in secret. Then, flip the coin to say or not the question.
Finally, if heads click it to see and say the question to everybody. If tails, the round has been finished.
Do you want to flip a real coin or see the random coin of the app ?
I will use a real coin
Finally, if heads click ‘HEADS’ to see and say the question to everybody. If tails, the round has been finished.
